short.am,ar,bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,: Halloween Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Halloween background. Halloween wallpaper background theme for fans.

short.cs: Rozšíření Tapeta Hvězdné války mění stránku nové karty s tapetou Hvězdné války HD na pozadí. Motivy pro fanoušky Hvězdné války.

short.fi: Halloween sota laajennus vaihtaa uuden välilehden Halloween sota taustakuvan HD-taustalla. Teemat Halloween sota faneille.

short.it: L'estensione Halloween cambia nuova scheda con lo sfondo HD di Halloween. Temi per i fan di Halloween.
short.ja: ハロウィーンの壁紙拡張機能は、カスタムのハロウィーンの壁紙HD背景で新しいタブページを変更します。ハロウィーンファンのためのテーマ。
short.ko: 할로윈 배경 화면 확장은 사용자 정의 할로윈 배경 화면 HD 배경으로 새 탭 페이지를 변경합니다. 할로윈 팬을위한 테마.
short.pl: Rozszerzenie Halloween zmienia nową kartę z tapetą Halloween HD. Motywy dla fanów Halloween.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: A extensão Dia das Bruxas muda a nova guia com o fundo HD do papel de parede Dia das Bruxas. Temas para fãs do Dia das Bruxas.
short.sv: Halloween förlängning ändra ny flik med Halloween tapeter HD bakgrund. Teman för Halloween fans.

short.zh_CN: 万圣节壁纸扩展程序重新定义了您的Chrome新标签页成为万圣节的背景壁纸。万圣节粉丝的主题。
short.zh_TW: 萬聖節壁紙擴展程序重新定義了您的Chrome新標籤頁成為萬聖節的背景壁紙。萬聖節粉絲的主題。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Halloween wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Halloween background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Search Bar using Google.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Halloween new tab.
